translated: The Monastic Code of the Elders

analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga  sekhiya kaṇḍa  sak kacca vagga
translated: The Great Analysis🔽The chapter on training rules for the community of monks🔽The sub-chapter on respect
The training rule on covering with rice

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme
translated: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādenti bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāya …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sūpam pi byañjanam pi odanena paṭicchādenti bhiyyokamyatam upādāya pe
translated: the monks from the group of six covered their rice with curry and vice versa, aiming to get more. …

original: “Na sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na sūpam vā byañjanam vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyatam upādāya ati sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
translated: ‘“I will not cover my curry with rice or my rice with curry, aiming to get more,” this is how you should train.’”

original: Na sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādetabbaṁ bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāya.
analyzed: na sūpam vā byañjanam vā odanena paṭicchādetabbam bhiyyokamyatam upādāya
translated: One should not cover one’s curry with rice or one’s rice with curry, aiming to get more.

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādeti bhiyyokamyataṁ upādāya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sūpam vā byañjanam vā odanena paṭicchādeti bhiyyokamyatam upādāya āpatti dukkaṭassa
translated: If a monk, out of disrespect, covers his curry with rice or his rice with curry, aiming to get more, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

analyzed: anāpatti  a san cit ca  assatiyā
translated: There is no offense🔽if it is unintentional;
if the owners have him cover it and then give it to him;
if he does not aim to get more;🔽if there is a danger;
if he is insane;🔽if he is the first offender.
